calcal 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Define calendar objects

Source: R/aa_calendar.R, R/bahai.R, R/chinese.R, and 7 more
cal_calendar.Rd

Generate a calendar object of class "calcal". Examples of calendars produced in this way include cal_chinese, cal_gregorian, cal_hebrew, cal_islamic, cal_iso, cal_julian, and cal_roman.

Usage

cal_calendar(
  name,
  short_name,
  granularities,
  validate_granularities,
  format,
  from_rd,
  to_rd
)

cal_bahai

cal_chinese

cal_coptic

cal_ethiopic

cal_gregorian

cal_hebrew

cal_islamic

cal_iso

cal_julian

cal_roman

Format

An object of class calcal

Arguments

name

Name of calendar

short_name

Short name of calendar

granularities

Character vector with names of granularities of calendar (e.g., for the Gregorian calendar, the granularities are year, month, and day).

validate_granularities

Function to check granularities are valid (e.g., Gregorian months should be between 1 and 12).

format

Functon to specify date format as a character string.

from_rd

Function to convert from RD to calendar date.

to_rd

Function to convert from calendar date to RD.

Examples

new_date(year = 2025, month = 4, day = 19:30, calendar = cal_gregorian)
#> <gregorian[12]>
#>  [1] 2025-Apr-19 2025-Apr-20 2025-Apr-21 2025-Apr-22 2025-Apr-23 2025-Apr-24
#>  [7] 2025-Apr-25 2025-Apr-26 2025-Apr-27 2025-Apr-28 2025-Apr-29 2025-Apr-30
as_date("2016-01-01", calendar = cal_islamic)
#> <Islamic[1]>
#> [1] 1437-Rab1-20
as_date(Sys.Date(), calendar = cal_islamic)
#> <Islamic[1]>
#> [1] 1446-Dhu'l_H-15
tibble::tibble(
  x = new_date(year = 2025, month = 5, day = 1:31, calendar = cal_gregorian),
  y = as_date(x, calendar = cal_islamic)
)
#> # A tibble: 31 × 2
#>              x               y
#>          <Gre>           <Hij>
#>  1 2025-May-01 1446-Dhu'l_Q-03
#>  2 2025-May-02 1446-Dhu'l_Q-04
#>  3 2025-May-03 1446-Dhu'l_Q-05
#>  4 2025-May-04 1446-Dhu'l_Q-06
#>  5 2025-May-05 1446-Dhu'l_Q-07
#>  6 2025-May-06 1446-Dhu'l_Q-08
#>  7 2025-May-07 1446-Dhu'l_Q-09
#>  8 2025-May-08 1446-Dhu'l_Q-10
#>  9 2025-May-09 1446-Dhu'l_Q-11
#> 10 2025-May-10 1446-Dhu'l_Q-12
#> # ℹ 21 more rows
